name: Twinsword
description:
My submission for the first #TechnicallyAGameJam!

The game is inspired by top-down action adventure games like Death's Door and Hyper Light Drifter, with the twist that the game will be a boss rush that's played in local 2-player co-op mode.

Due to development restrictions, this is currently just one boss fight with a single player, but I wanted to get a feel of how to make a nice boss sequence and establish some interesting visuals and a juicy game feel.

Controls:

The game currently supports only gamepad.

Left stick - Move

Bottom button - Jump

Left button - Attack

Right shoulder button - Dash

Credits:

Programming/Art/Design: Harry Alisavakis

Audio & music: Ramita ( https://ram1ta.itch.io )
